casebody.data:
HOLLY RIDGE ASSO.
v.
NCDENR, et al. No. 218A06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 17, 2007. Alexander Elkan, George W. House, S. Kyle Woosley, Greensboro, for Holly Ridge Associates, LLC. James Gulick, Senior Deputy Attorney General, Nancy Reed Dunn, Assistant Attorney General, for NCDENR, et al. *806Derb S. Carter, Jr., Chapel Hill, Amy Pickle, for NC Shellfish Growers Asso., et al.

The following order has been entered on the joint motion filed on the 17th day of January 2007 by Respondents and Intervenor Respondents for Extension of Time:

"Motion Allowed. Respondents and Intervenor Respondents shall have up to and including the 6th day of February 2007 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 17th day of January 2007."
